name: Out of the Mirror
description:
A little game called Out of the mirror. I created this game for the gamedev.js jam 2021 You control two characters in the same time and on the right side of the screen there is some spikes. Don't touch them ====== CONTROLS ======
  • left and right to move
  • c to jump
  • x+c+arrow to dash
  • c+arrow to wall jump
====== CREDITS ======
  • Code by me
  • Arts by me
  • Sound by me
  • Inspirated by Celeste and Super Meat boy
There is a lot of small bugs in this game but... I Hope You Enjoy :P MarcoDXV
